page.title: 12CLUBS IN NORTH BRENT
page.content: Clubs are very popular. There are a variety of clubs both at school and outside, like the Kenton Jewish Youth Club. Brownies and Sports Clubs. They cater for different religions, ages and cultural groups. They're for enjoyment and for meeting other people.{Activities}vary, such as at Brownies we sing songs, play games and have fun. We meet in various places,eg:synagogues, barns, school halls. A popular club is the Jewish Lads ang Girls Brigade (JLGB), for children 5-17.Activities here are football, dance, art, needlework, tennis, drama, cooking and making things. Sports clubs attended and football, tennis and judo. A more unusual club is the Brent Schools Symphony Orchestra (BSSO) at which children from all over the Borough play their various instruments.
